Package fr.cnrs.iees.graph

Interface EdgeFactory

All Known Subinterfaces:
GraphFactory
All Known Implementing Classes:
ALGraphFactory, GraphFactoryAdapter, TreeGraphFactory
public interface EdgeFactory

A factory to create Edges in an appropriate way. cf. GraphFactory for the rationale behind factories.

Since edges cannot exist without nodes, implementing classes should make sure that the creation of an edge is appropriately reflected in node instances (e.g. in ALNode, by inserting the edge in its start node and end node edge lists).

Implementing classes must have a constructor taking a scope as a parameter, or internally building a IdentityScope, to guarantee unicity of edge IDs.

Author:
Jacques Gignoux 7-11-2018

  • Field Details

    • defaultEdgeId

      static final String defaultEdgeId
      A default edge identifier (e.g. to start a LocalScope)
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

  • Method Details

    • makeEdge

      default Edge makeEdge​(Node start, Node end)
      Create an edge with no properties. The class ID is set to the default (= the implementing class name). The instance ID is automatically generated and is unique within the scope of this factory.
      Parameters:
      start - the start node for this edge
      end - the end node for this edge
      Returns:
      the new Edge instance

    • makeEdge

      default Edge makeEdge​(Node start, Node end, ReadOnlyPropertyList props)
      Create an edge with properties. The class ID is set to the default (= the implementing class name). The instance ID is automatically generated and is unique within the scope of this factory.
      Parameters:
      start - the start node for this edge
      end - the end node for this edge
      props - properties
      Returns:
      the new Edge instance

    • makeEdge

      Edge makeEdge​(Node start, Node end, String proposedId)
      Create an edge with no properties and a proposed ID. The class ID is set to the default (= the implementing class name). The proposed ID is checked for unicity within the scope of this factory, and if not, is modified appropriately to be unique. Therefore, the returned instance may have a unique ID different from the one proposed as an argument.
      Parameters:
      start - the start node for this edge
      end - the end node for this edge
      proposedId - the instance identifier
      Returns:
      the new Edge instance

    • makeEdge

      Edge makeEdge​(Node start, Node end, String proposedId, ReadOnlyPropertyList props)
      Create an edge with a particular instance ID and properties. The class ID is set to the default (= the implementing class name). The proposed ID is checked for unicity within the scope of this factory, and if not, is modified appropriately to be unique. Therefore, the returned instance may have a unique ID different from the one proposed as an argument.
      Parameters:
      start - the start node for this edge
      end - the end node for this edge
      proposedId - the instance identifier
      props - properties
      Returns:
      the new Edge instance

    • edgeClassName

      default String edgeClassName​(Class<? extends Edge> edgeClass)
      Factories may use labels (= just Strings), as aliases for Edge descendant class names. This method returns the label of an edge class as known by this factory.
      Parameters:
      edgeClass - the edge class
      Returns:
      the edge class label recorded in this factory. Defaults to Class.getSimpleName().

    • edgeClass

      default Class<? extends Edge> edgeClass​(String label)
      Factories may use labels (= just Strings), as aliases for Edge descendant class names. This method returns the class type matching an edge label. Default behaviour is to pretend that label is a class name in the package fr.cnrs.iees.graph.impl.
      Parameters:
      label - the label to get the class associated to it
      Returns:
      the class name matching the label argument

    • makeEdge

      Edge makeEdge​(Class<? extends Edge> edgeClass, Node start, Node end, String proposedId, ReadOnlyPropertyList props)
      Create an edge of a particular sub-class with properties and a proposed ID. The class ID is set to the implementing class name or, if recorded in this factory, to its label. The proposed ID is checked for unicity within the scope of this factory, and if not, is modified appropriately to be unique. Therefore, the returned instance may have a unique ID different from the one proposed as an argument.
      Parameters:
      edgeClass - the Edge implementation to use to create this instance
      start - the start node for this edge
      end - the end node for this edge
      proposedId - the instance identifier
      props - properties
      Returns:
      the new Edge instance, null if construction failed

    • makeEdge

      Edge makeEdge​(Class<? extends Edge> edgeClass, Node start, Node end, String proposedId)
      Create an edge of a particular sub-class with no properties and a proposed ID. The class ID is set to the implementing class name or, if recorded in this factory, to its label. The proposed ID is checked for unicity within the scope of this factory, and if not, is modified appropriately to be unique. Therefore, the returned instance may have a unique ID different from the one proposed as an argument.
      Parameters:
      edgeClass - the Edge implementation to use to create this instance
      start - the start node for this edge
      end - the end node for this edge
      proposedId - the instance identifier
      Returns:
      the new Edge instance, null if construction failed

      Parameters:
      edgeClass - the Edge implementation to use to create this instance
      start - the start node for this edge
      end - the end node for this edge
      props - properties
      Returns:
      the new Edge instance, null if construction failed
